This repository contains scripts for the Registered Report: "Assessing causal links between age at menarche and adolescent mental health: a Mendelian randomisation study".

The Stage 1 Registered Report has been accepted in-principle in BMC Medicine, and the Stage 2 manuscript has been submitted.
